text: The 1963 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 27th edition of the women's singles championship. Kimiyo Matsuzaki defeated Maria Alexandru in the final by three sets to two, to win the title. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1963 in women's table tennis
title: 1963 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
